markdownRemark.html: Located close to Fuengirola on the Costa del Sol, this is a great course with breathtaking views and a variety of differing holes to test any standard of golfer. The setting for the restaurant is superb. Sitting above the trees with views of the mountains behind and the sea in front. This course is not for the faint hearted! It requires accuracy, power and precision. Many of the holes cannot be seen from the tee position.
